This is another Greatest Mahjong Game by Shen Zhongyuan!
It is not only challenging and addictive, but makes your brain soft as well!

Youtube Demo
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoHXEGn3uu0c

***Game goal
Clear the board by removing three same tiles each time as quickly as possible.

***How to remove
* Move maximum one time for each direction.
* Move until two pairs are at same line with no tiles between them.
